mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO at_sale_line ( FID, FEntryID, FMaterialID, FMaterialNumber, FMaterialName, FMaterialTypeNumber, FMaterialTypeName, FUnit, FSaleNum, FSalesPrice, FDealPrice, FRate, FDiscount, FAllAmount, FStockPrice, FStockID, FStockNumber, FStockName, FBatch, FPayWay, FPayWayName, FPayMoney ) VALUES ( #{FID}, #{FEntryID}, #{FMaterialID}, #{FMaterialNumber}, #{FMaterialName}, #{FMaterialTypeNumber}, #{FMaterialTypeName}, #{FUnit}, #{FSaleNum}, #{FSalesPrice}, #{FDealPrice}, #{FRate}, #{FDiscount}, #{FAllAmount}, #{FStockPrice}, #{FStockID}, #{FStockNumber}, #{FStockName}, #{FBatch}, #{FPayWay}, #{FPayWayName}, #{FPayMoney} )

INSERT IGNORE INTO at_sale_line ( FID, FEntryID, FMaterialID, FMaterialNumber, FMaterialName, FMaterialTypeNumber, FMaterialTypeName, FUnit, FSaleNum, FSalesPrice, FDealPrice, FRate, FDiscount, FAllAmount, FStockPrice, FStockID, FStockNumber, FStockName, FBatch, FPayWay, FPayWayName, FPayMoney ) VALUES
( #{item.FID}, #{item.FEntryID}, #{item.FMaterialID}, #{item.FMaterialNumber}, #{item.FMaterialName}, #{item.FMaterialTypeNumber}, #{item.FMaterialTypeName}, #{item.FUnit}, #{item.FSaleNum}, #{item.FSalesPrice}, #{item.FDealPrice}, #{item.FRate}, #{item.FDiscount}, #{item.FAllAmount}, #{item.FStockPrice}, #{item.FStockID}, #{item.FStockNumber}, #{item.FStockName}, #{item.FBatch}, #{item.FPayWay}, #{item.FPayWayName}, #{item.FPayMoney} )
